topics.body:
All of you guys changing your icons. I'm happy with my icon thank you very much.
By the way, this thread is in no way wasting my time. Is that bad?

topics.body:
"@JustLikeTheNewGuy":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547bdf9463687228a2db0000#post_547bdf9463687228a2db0000
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547bdfd863687216f2560000#post_547bdfd863687216f2560000

"Thank God for LF":http://www.equestriadaily.com/2014/11/what-twilight-sparkle-rainbow-dash-and.html

While FiM is a distinct exception to all this. It just seems that all cartoon equines end up as hideous piles horseshit. Only FiM-style Ponies by Lauren Faust, is able to make Ponies look appealing and break away from this curse. Not only that, they exceeded the appeal of many cartoon animal species. Something that other cartoon equines can only dream of achieving.
